ad_text: Applichat Healthcare Sponsored Allied Health Professionals - Get comprehensive benefits, great employee discounts and discounted childcare services. Join CHRISTUS Health, Santa Rosa and work with an award-winning team. CHRISTUS Santa Rosa brings you an exciting opportunity at one of the largest Catholic health systems in the U.S. and the only Catholic non-profit health system in San Antonio and the surrounding areas. If you’ve always wanted to transform lives while working in a caring and compassionate environment, CHRISTUS Health would love for you to join their team! They are currently hiring: Clinical Laboratory Scientists Certified Surgical Technologists Respiratory Therapists Pharmacy Technicians Pharmacists Multiskilled Radiology Technicians CT Techs Cardiovascular Technologists Here are 7 reasons why you’ll love working at CHRISTUS Health: ✅ Save for your future today with CHRISTUS Health’s Matched Savings Plan (403b). ✅ Feel a weight taken off your shoulders with tuition reimbursement ✅ Unlock your potential with programs such as RISE CHRISTUS Mentorship, and Emerging Leaders. ✅ CHRISTUS cares about your well-being and offers comprehensive medical, dental and vision benefits. ✅ Make the most of your free time with employee discounts on flights, electronics, event tickets and more with Abenity. ✅ CHRISTUS cares about their Associates! Enjoy mental, physical, social, and financial well-being support with LifeWorks so you can be the best version of yourself. ✅ Provide the best care for your family with discounted childcare/daycare services with Bright Horizons. CHRISTUS Health’s healing ministry now includes five full-service hospitals in San Antonio and surrounding areas, and a number of specialty centers. If you want to grow your skills in a new and challenging environment, join CHRISTUS Santa Rosa Health System and click the ‘sign up’ button below. We’ll ask you a few questions to get to know your professional background and call you if you’re a good match. Allied Health Professionals - Apply in 60 seconds and join an award-winning team. Apply Now

Relocate and earn up to $59.59/hr. As a non-profit healthcare organization, their caregivers have the time and support to focus on people over profit. 5. With their values at the forefront of everything we do, their culture is one of inclusion and compassionate care. 6. Take your career to the next level with ample opportunities to advance and specialize. 7. Enjoy state-of-the-art facilities and tools in our mid-sized healthcare organization where your experience is valued, and your voice is heard. 8. Applichat Healthcare Sponsored RNs - Want to experience something new each weekend? Move to Bellingham, where everything your adventurous soul desires is just a short drive away. You will enjoy a rewarding career as you work with and learn from an amazing team of doctors and nurses. Here’s why you’d love to work and live in Bellingham, Washington. 🧭 If winter sports are your thing - or the outdoors - Bellingham has a lot to offer. Within a short drive are a very wide variety of environments - mountains, lakes, streams, the ocean, forests and cities. 🧭 Find more perks just a short ferry ride away from San Juan Island and neighboring islands ….Enjoy cruises, yachting and sailing among other aquatic-loving activities. 🧭 The bustling city life of Seattle and Vancouver, BC are just 60 minutes away. In the mood for a captivating event or a day of shopping? Take a fun day trip to the city. 🧭 Ever heard of the Historic Fairhaven? It’s a local favorite. You could spend all day exploring its intimate events, diners, shops and attractions. 🧭 With an average population age of 31, Bellingham is a vibrant community of good-hearted people. You could stroll to your favorite eateries all while enjoying a variety of live music on your way there at one of the many open-air public spaces. Considering the move? Here are some more reasons to apply: 1. They offer competitive salaries up to $71.57/hr + great differentials. 2. You’ll enjoy comprehensive benefits including mental health services. 3. Applichat Healthcare Sponsored RNs - Want a fresh start and a new life in 2023? Move to Sitka, Alaska, and earn a $50,000 sign-on bonus with SEARHC at Mt. Edgecumbe Medical Center. Wondering if you need an Alaskan RN license to be eligible? You don’t! What you do need is a valid RN licensure in any US state to jump at this opportunity. Here are 12 reasons why moving to Alaska could be the best decision you ever make. ✔️ Earn more - A full-time RN job with SEARHC comes with a $50,000 sign-on bonus, $10,000 in relocation assistance to help with the move, and $4,000 in annual tuition reimbursement after a year of employment. ✔️ Get paid to live in Alaska - Believe it or not, Alaska will actually pay you to move there through its established Permanent Fund Dividend Program. Every year, full-time residents of Alaska receive royalties from the Permanent Fund’s investment earnings. ✔️ Enjoy the great outdoors - You’ll be hard-pressed to find anywhere as uniquely beautiful as Alaska. From snow-covered mountains to awe-inspiring skies, and a dormant volcano, the natural beauty of Alaska is breathtaking. You’ll see and experience the world’s most beautiful wildlife, natural phenomena, and landscapes regularly. ✔️ Comprehensive benefits - Kick in on the 1st of the month immediately following your hire date. Get medical, dental & vision benefits, Life/AD&D insurance, short & long-term disability insurance, a flexible spending account, 401(k), employee assistance, and more. ✔️ Generous paid time off - As an RN with SEARHC, you’ll earn 208 hours of PTO annually, going up to 260 hours annually. ✔️ A slower, more relaxed pace of life - Working in a small 25-bed hospital means work is less stressful, more patient-focused and leads to great working relationships. ✔️ Small town charms with great history - Sitka has great food, art, and culture, but without the high prices and incessant traffic of other major cities. ✔️ Amazing summers - With almost 24 hours of daylight, it doesn’t get more magical than an Alaskan summer. Whatever your sport of choice — fishing, backpacking, kayaking, mountain biking, paddle boarding, hang gliding and more — summer in Alaska is perfect for it. ✔️ Career opportunities - With SEARHC, you’ll have nursing opportunities across the state which means you have the pick of where you want to live, and your choice of department to work in. ✔️ Cost of living - Although it may be more expensive to live in Alaska, the tax rate is the lowest in the United States. There’s no income tax, sales tax, or property tax. Housing is also rather affordable. ✔️ Life in the great outdoors is not an afterthought, it’s a priority - A weekend in Sitka usually involves hiking or backpacking through beautiful landscapes or spending some time out by the water fishing or camping. You’ll still have to work, but being “outdoorsy” will be an integral part of your everyday life. ✔️Get help with your move - SEARHC’s Property Manager will assist you in finding the best accommodation to meet your needs and make you feel at home. If 2022 has you craving a change of scene or needing peace and quiet, Sitka, Alaska is where you’ll find it. Now is the perfect time to make your next move matter! Click below to answer a few quick questions and someone from our team will reach out with more information. APPLICHAT.TYPEFORM.COM RNs - Want a fresh start and a new life in 2023? Applichat Healthcare Sponsored RNs - Want a fresh start and a new life in 2023? Move to Sitka, Alaska, and earn a $50,000 sign-on bonus with SEARHC at Mt. Edgecumbe Medical Center. Wondering if you need an Alaskan RN license to be eligible? You don’t! What you do need is a valid RN licensure in any US state to jump at this opportunity. Here are 12 reasons why moving to Alaska could be the best decision you ever make. ✔️ Earn more - A full-time RN job with SEARHC comes with a $50,000 sign-on bonus, $10,000 in relocation assistance to help with the move, and $4,000 in annual tuition reimbursement after a year of employment. ✔️ Get paid to live in Alaska - Believe it or not, Alaska will actually pay you to move there through its established Permanent Fund Dividend Program. Every year, full-time residents of Alaska receive royalties from the Permanent Fund’s investment earnings. ✔️ Enjoy the great outdoors - You’ll be hard-pressed to find anywhere as uniquely beautiful as Alaska. From snow-covered mountains to awe-inspiring skies, and a dormant volcano, the natural beauty of Alaska is breathtaking. You’ll see and experience the world’s most beautiful wildlife, natural phenomena, and landscapes regularly. ✔️ Comprehensive benefits - Kick in on the 1st of the month immediately following your hire date. Get medical, dental & vision benefits, Life/AD&D insurance, short & long-term disability insurance, a flexible spending account, 401(k), employee assistance, and more. ✔️ Generous paid time off - As an RN with SEARHC, you’ll earn 208 hours of PTO annually, going up to 260 hours annually. ✔️ A slower, more relaxed pace of life - Working in a small 25-bed hospital means work is less stressful, more patient-focused and leads to great working relationships. ✔️ Small town charms with great history - Sitka has great food, art, and culture, but without the high prices and incessant traffic of other major cities. ✔️ Amazing summers - With almost 24 hours of daylight, it doesn’t get more magical than an Alaskan summer. Whatever your sport of choice — fishing, backpacking, kayaking, mountain biking, paddle boarding, hang gliding and more — summer in Alaska is perfect for it. ✔️ Career opportunities - With SEARHC, you’ll have nursing opportunities across the state which means you have the pick of where you want to live, and your choice of department to work in. ✔️ Cost of living - Although it may be more expensive to live in Alaska, the tax rate is the lowest in the United States. There’s no income tax, sales tax, or property tax. Housing is also rather affordable. ✔️ Life in the great outdoors is not an afterthought, it’s a priority - A weekend in Sitka usually involves hiking or backpacking through beautiful landscapes or spending some time out by the water fishing or camping. You’ll still have to work, but being “outdoorsy” will be an integral part of your everyday life. ✔️Get help with your move - SEARHC’s Property Manager will assist you in finding the best accommodation to meet your needs and make you feel at home. If 2022 has you craving a change of scene or needing peace and quiet, Sitka, Alaska is where you’ll find it. Now is the perfect time to make your next move matter! Click below to answer a few quick questions and someone from our team will reach out with more information. FB.ME RNs - Want a fresh start and a new life in 2023? Sign up

Applichat Healthcare Sponsored RNs - Ever dreamed of how great it would be to drop everything and go on an adventure to Alaska? Well, here’s your chance to turn that dream into reality. Get a full-time job with SEARHC and move to Sitka, Alaska. Earn up to a $50,000 sign-on bonus and $10,000 in relocation assistance to help with the move. And don’t worry about out-of-state licensure - as a Tribal health organization, they can hire nurses with a license in any US state. Join a team of 1400 employees serving 27 communities in Alaska. America’s last frontier is a world of wildlife, wilderness and mesmerizing northern lights. Be part of a small community of caring and friendly people, and leave the stress of big-city life behind. Interested? Even if you’re not actively looking for a change just yet, apply, and find out what opportunities are out there. Click the sign-up button below to get started. Answer a few quick questions and someone from our team will reach out with more information. Ever dreamed of how great it would be to drop everything and go on an adventure to Alaska? Sign Up

Applichat Healthcare Sponsored RNs: Life in Sitka is just minutes away from a great open Alaskan wilderness. Enjoy connecting with nature, culture, history, and a friendly, welcoming community. Join SEARHC at Mt. Edgecumbe Medical Center, Sitka, Alaska. Earn a $50,000 sign-on bonus, $10,000 in relocation assistance to help with the move, and $4,000 in annual tuition reimbursement after a year of employment. Click below to answer a few quick questions and someone from our team will reach out with more information. RNs: Life in Sitka is just minutes away from a great open Alaskan wilderness Sign Up

Applichat Healthcare Sponsored RNs - Hate spending all day in traffic or at the hospital? Say goodbye to long commutes. Move to Sitka, Alaska and work 5 minutes away from where you live. Here are 11 reasons why moving to Alaska could be the best decision you ever make. ✔️ Earn more - A full-time RN job with SEARHC comes with a $50,000 sign-on bonus, $10,000 in relocation assistance to help with the move, and $4,000 in annual tuition reimbursement after a year of employment. ✔️ Get paid to live in Alaska - Believe it or not, Alaska will actually pay you to move there through its established Permanent Fund Dividend Program. Every year, full-time residents of Alaska receive royalties from the Permanent Fund’s investment earnings. ✔️ Enjoy the great outdoors - You’ll be hard-pressed to find anywhere as uniquely beautiful as Alaska. From snow-covered mountains to awe-inspiring skies, and a dormant volcano, the natural beauty of Alaska is breathtaking. You’ll see and experience the world’s most beautiful wildlife, natural phenomena, and landscapes regularly. ✔️ Comprehensive benefits - Kick in on the 1st of the month immediately following your hire date. Get medical, dental & vision benefits, Life/AD&D insurance, short & long-term disability insurance, a flexible spending account, 401(k), employee assistance, and more. ✔️ Generous paid time off - As an RN with SEARHC, you’ll earn 208 hours of PTO annually, going up to 260 hours annually. ✔️ A slower, more relaxed pace of life - Working in a small 25-bed hospital means work is less stressful, more patient-focused and leads to great working relationships. ✔️ Small town charms with great history - Sitka has great food, art, and culture, but without the high prices and incessant traffic of other major cities. ✔️ Amazing summers - With almost 24 hours of daylight, it doesn’t get more magical than an Alaskan summer. Whatever your sport of choice — fishing, backpacking, kayaking, mountain biking, paddle boarding, hang gliding and more — summer in Alaska is perfect for it. ✔️ Career opportunities - With SEARHC, you’ll have nursing opportunities across the state which means you have the pick of where you want to live, and your choice of department to work in. ✔️ Cost of living - Although it may be more expensive to live in Alaska, the tax rate is the lowest in the United States. There’s no income tax, sales tax, or property tax. Housing is also rather affordable. ✔️ Life in the great outdoors is not an afterthought, it’s a priority - A weekend in Sitka usually involves hiking or backpacking through beautiful landscapes or spending some time out by the water fishing or camping. You’ll still have to work, but being “outdoorsy” will be an integral part of your everyday life. If 2022 has you craving a change of scene or needing peace and quiet, Sitka, Alaska is where you’ll find it. Now is the perfect time to make your next move matter! Click below to answer a few quick questions and someone from our team will reach out with more information. FB.ME RNs - Move to Sitka Alaska for a new start in 2023 Sign up
